hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn Al-Munkadir and Ibrahim bin Maisarah, that they heard Anas say:"I prayed Zuhr with the Prophet (ﷺ) in Al-Madinah, four Rak'ahs and 'Asr in Dhul-Hulaifah, two Rak'ahs

chapter.ara-name: باب عَدَدِ صَلاَةِ الظُّهْرِ فِي الْحَضَرِ .
chapter.eng-name: The Number Of Rak'ahs In The Zuhr Prayer While A Resident
